name: simone bonnet
notes:
looking for a delicate, feminine knit girl bonnet pattern? the simone bonnet is soft, classic, and perfect for everything from newborn photos to everyday wear.

✔️ knit flat, then joined in the round for the crown
✔️ features a picot hem edge on the front
✔️ uses the same lace stitch as the [simone socks][1] (perfect matching set!)
✔️ shaped with crown decreases and finished with i-cord ties
✔️ written in clear, beginner-friendly instructions
✔️ makes a lovely heirloom gift or baby shower present

the simone bonnet is a beautiful lace baby bonnet pattern designed to highlight dainty details without being overly complicated. it’s the kind of project you’ll knit again and again—for your little ones or someone else’s.

pairs beautifully with the [simone socks][2] for a matching look. also uses the same yarn as the [wheat bonnet][3] and [chain bonnet][4] if you're building a soft and coordinated set.

 yarn: [knitpicks capretta (affiliate link)][5]
 needles: [us 2 (3mm) (affiliate link)][6]
 designed with newborn photography and everyday use in mind
 great stashbuster for luxury fingering yarn

add it to your queue, save it to your favorites, and don’t forget to tag your project photos with [simone bonnet][7] so others can find it too!
